Plot: The film is inspired by true events and centers on a young journalist, who goes to Transylvania together with a French TV crew led by a top reporter, to deal with a case of a young prostitute repatriated from France.
Title: The Fixer
Writer: Adrian Silisteanu (screenplay), Claudia Silisteanu (screenplay), Claudia Silisteanu (story)
Actors: Sorin Cocis, Andrei Gajzago, Tudor Istodor, Mehdi Nebbou
